title: Seeing a sound
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Jane Passy, a speech therapist, explains how valuable her system of cued articulation can be in primary education in helping children to learn the consonant sounds of the English language. The method involves hand movements to demonstrate the physical actions of speech.
